title: Burgast
description: Area in the Altai region of extreme western Mongolia containing a number of burials and other structures from the Bronze Age (Bulan-Kobin Culture), Turkic, and Medieval periods.

properties.description: Point representing the main excavation area at Burgast (the Bulan-Kobin burial site) after Lepetz 2022.
properties.title: Imagery location of Burgast
